## Repository Organisation

`/R`

This contains the scripts with codes used for data analyses.

1.  \`SpliceQ_from_scratch.R\` details the steps in processing the SpliceQ data generated from RNA Seq data
2.  \`metadata_extraction.R\` shows how metadata from the Trainome files are generated and processed
3.  \`metadata_public_data.R\` shows how the metadata from the publicly available RNA-Seq data were generated\
